page.title: 16Housing in Rochford Area.
page.content: We discovered some interesting facts about our area. Looking at the total population we found that 6.3% are under the age of four, 17.5% are between the ages of 5 and 15, 41.1% are between the ages of 16 and 44, 17.5% are between the ages of 45 and 59 and 17.6% are over the age of 60. 7.4% of the people in this area are retired. We also found out that 82.7% of the people own their own houses. The rest rent their houses.Here are some typical prices of houses. In 1985 a terraced house cost Â£32,000 -Â£34,000. A Semi- detached house cost Â£34,000-Â£44,000. A detached house over Â£40,000. The average size of a family in the Rochford District is 2.87 persons. Many of the houses have been built in the last 30 years and it is usual for them to have either three or four bedrooms.
